songs.title: Watching Her Move

She got every single guy in the club

Just watching her move
And she don't wanna dance with anyone
Let her do what she do

She got every single guy in the club
Just watching her move
And she don't wanna dance with anyone

Just watch her get it

She got every single guy in the club

And she don't wanna dance with anyone
